column2: As a Chapter Section Lead you will focus on capabilities development of your section members that align with the chapter vision. You will encourage your team to self-define their career journey and seek ways to enable development opportunities in the direction of the journey. You will have an understanding of the roles within your section to provide mentorship when needed.                 What youll be working on               The Data & Analytics Chapter will build excellence and mastery in next generation data and analytics capabilities, including but not limited to Data Science, Data Engineering, Analytics and Data Management     Expertise from the Chapter will be embedded into initiatives across multiple business and foundational domains to drive value generation and promote cross-functional analysis and collaboration     In addition to partnering with teams across the business to develop solutions, scale and automate data pipelines, Chapter members are uniquely placed to connect the dots across initiatives, promote information sharing across domains and recommend re-use of data, analytics and solutions wherever possible             Data Engineering encompasses the capabilities involved in designing, building, operationalising, securing and monitoring data pipelines to be used for analytics and data science purposes     Data engineering practitioners possess a wide variety of capabilities such as being able to ingest, transform and load data from multiple data sources, build automated data pipelines to manage and process data at scale, design and model data, index and process contents for search, leverage DevOps capabilities to design and build frameworks to automate build and deployment of data and machine learning products on premise and/or in the cloud              STAKEHOLDER MANAGEMENT AND PARTNERING                 Understand the current and future needs of the Domains in order to develop the strategic direction of the chapter along with Chapter leadership by exploring and implementing new strategic capabilities to stay Cevergreen             Ensure that resources are available for the demand intake process in order to meet stakeholder needs and priorities                   LEADERSHIP AND INFLUENCE               People Management and Coaching             Evaluate, promote, coach, and develop chapter members             Seek, evaluate and act on feedback on chapter members                 It is envisioned that the Section Lead role provides significant contribution with up to 50% of the time to product teams and internal informatics priorities.\u00A0             Resource and Portfolio Management             Co-create and maintain chapter strategy and workforce planning to define and build up the right capabilities and equip people with the skills, tools, and standard approaches to deliver functional excellence             Allocate talent to different roles in squads and ensure that they are deployed to value-creation opportunities             Monitor, analyze and improve the demand intake process to optimize effective people mobilization of both FTE and external workforce                 Capability and Practice Development             Foster an environment where standards and best practices are developed and shared             Continuously improve the chapter capabilities to enable value creation                       What you'll need to be successful               Product or people leadership experience within Data and Analytics             Preferable several years of experience in Data Engineering or Analytics & Insights with technical leadership experience (eg. Tech. Lead, Data Science Product Owner etc.)\u00A0\u00A0             Bachelor or advanced degree in relevant field of education\u00A0\u00A0             Exhibits servant and creative leadership (VACC) behavior             Exhibits a Lean-Agile Mindset             Demonstrated experience building high performing teams             Experienced in leading co-located as well as remote teams             Have a keen IT market focus: you are passionate about major trends for the specific discipline             Demonstrates an executive presence, strong business acumen, ability to navigate ambiguity, and manages complexity             Manages risks progressively and in a way that leads to opportunity             Enterprise mindset that can break down silos. Focus on delivery through collaboration, and bringing people together to work towards the same purpose across organizational boundaries.             Ability to empower teams and individuals to act autonomously and hold them accountable.             Exhibits intellectual curiosity and integrity and has a strong passion for innovation

column2: The Procurement Analytics Analyst is responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data related to the procurement function      This role involves creating reports, dashboards, and providing actionable insights to enhance decision-making within the procurement department      The Analyst collaborates with cross-functional teams to drive efficiency, cost savings, and compliance in procurement processes                  Whats in it for you:      Join our team and contribute to our organizations success by harnessing the power of data and analytics to drive strategic procurement decisions. If youre passionate about transforming raw data into valuable insights, wed love to hear from you.              Key Responsibilities:                Data Collection: Gather procurement-related data from various sources, including ERP systems, supplier databases, and other relevant platforms.      Data Analysis: Analyze procurement data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement. Use statistical techniques and data visualization tools to present findings effectively.      Reporting and Dashboards: Develop and maintain procurement reports and dashboards to monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) such as spend analysis, supplier performance, and procurement cycle times. Support delivery of key reports to procurement and business stakeholders including providing Division specific reporting to stakeholders in SP business units as required.      Forecasting: Utilize historical data and market trends to create procurement forecasts, helping the organization make informed decisions about inventory levels, supplier selection, and budget allocation.      Compliance Monitoring: Ensure procurement activities align with regulatory requirements and internal policies. Report on compliance issues and recommend corrective actions.      Cost Optimization: Collaborate with procurement teams to identify cost-saving opportunities, negotiate supplier contracts, and track cost reduction initiatives.      Process Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement within the procurement function and work with stakeholders to implement changes.      Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with Sourcing, Contracting, Risk and other departments to align procurement strategies with overall business goals.      Communication: Present data-driven insights and recommendations to senior management and key stakeholders through clear and concise reports and presentations.                Qualifications:                Must be fluent English language speaker. Superior oral and written communication and presentation skills      Demonstrable experience in building strategic partnerships both internally and externally with key stakeholders and vendors with deep knowledge of vendors and trends to inform category planning      Must have experiencing using e-Sourcing tools (e.g. Ariba, Scout, Coupa, Ivalua etc.)      Bachelors degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, Data Analytics, or a related field a plus      Proven experience in data analysis, preferably within a procurement or supply chain context.      Proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Celonis, Alteryx, Tableau, Power BI) and advanced data analytics tools (e.g., Python, R) is a strong advantage.      Strong quantitative and qualitative analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.      Excellent communication skills to convey complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders effectively.      Familiarity with procurement processes, supplier management, and sourcing strategies.      Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on data accuracy and integrity.      Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and adapt to a fast-paced, dynamic environment      Flexible in work schedule.      Amenable to work in the Office (3x a week)

column1: Analytics Associate Manager - Insights and Intelligence
column2: Skill required:Sales support and Service Management - Sales Pipeline Management  Designation:Management Level - Associate Manager  Job Location:Bengaluru  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:10 to 14 years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights & Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. The team helps assess, design, build and implement best practices on process, organization, and technology to create, execute, and run a collaborative sales and support roles. A set of processes to manage, measure, and analyze the aggregate of opportunities in a pipeline (for example, at a salesperson, division, business unit level) to inform sales forecasts, salesperson/sales force activity, and areas of improvement  What are we looking for? Sales Operations (Sales Excellence)  Project Management  Business Transformation  Business Case Development  Business Insights  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Thought leadership  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Team Management Roles and Responsibilities  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  Typically creates new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person requires understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor or team leads  Generally, interacts with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  The person should require minimal guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions often impact the team in which they reside and occasionally impact other teams  Individual would manage medium-small sized teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column2: Skill required:  Property & Casualty - Catastrophe Risk Management Designation:  Analytics and Modeling Analyst Qualifications: BE/BTech  Years of Experience: 3 to 5 years  What would you do? We help insurers redefine their customer experience while accelerating their innovation agenda to drive sustainable growth by transforming to an intelligent operating model. Intelligent Insurance Operations combines our advisory, technology, and operations expertise, global scale, and robust ecosystem with our insurance transformation capabilities. It is structured to address the scope and complexity of the ever-changing insurance environment and offers a flexible operating model that can meet the unique needs of each market segment.Catastrophe Risk Management refers to the process of guiding insurers how to manage risk aggregations, deploy capital, and price insurance coverage by using computer assisted calculations to estimate the losses that could be sustained due to a catastrophic event such as a hurricane or earthquake. What are we looking for? Microsoft Excel Problem-solving skills Written and verbal communication Commitment to quality Agility for quick learning Ability to perform under pressure  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column1: SBOP-0 Manager - R&D Resource Forecasting & Analytics
column2: Senior Manager R&D Resource Forecasting & Analytics          The role:         In this important global role within our R&D Performance & Analytics department, you shape and deliver data-driven insights and robust resource forecasts to support the advancement of our Biopharma R&D pipeline     In close alignment and partnership with our operational planning leads, global project leads and portfolio analytics leads, you develop tailored analyses, benchmarks and fit-for-purpose reports to accelerate and optimize the performance of our global R&D operations     In addition, you ensure a streamlined operation of the R&D wide time tracking and resource forecasting system as well as related processes to safeguard our high standards of data reliability and integrity     This also includes the conception, evolution and delivery of effective trainings to our global R&D workforce     Finally, you also drive the continuous improvement of our operational efficiency by shaping and implementing robust automations of our internal core processes and workflows         Who you are:         Academic degree in a scientific, business or IT/data science-related field Master or MBA preferred      7 - 9+ years of relevant professional experience in analytics, performance/resource management, data science, project management or controlling      Professional experience in clinical development and/or biopharma industry highly preferred      Strong interpersonal communication, influencing and leadership skills      Experience in working in interdisciplinary global teams and influencing within a matrix      Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills      Solid organizational skills, high quality focus and result orientation     Advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills visualization tool skills (eg Tableau, Spotfire) are a plus      Knowledge of Enterprise Project Portfolio Management tools preferably, Planisware      Fluency in English

column2: Supports making data-driven decisions by extracting, validating, interpreting, preparing, and analyzing large amounts of data to deliver high-quality, complex, and timely analytics reporting     These analyses and reports will provide stakeholders with the data they need to make informed decisions in daily operations and strategic planning initiatives     Should be familiar with data sources and data models from various regulatory systems to build queries, retrieve, transform, load and aggregate data in understandable and usable formats     Work collaboratively with various IDMP)     Contributes to define the strategy of the Regulatory Compliance & Regulatory Information Management Department     Educate on data literacy for regulatory data     A background in Pharma, reporting and analytics activities

column2: Lead functional and technical architecture analysis, research, design, and development of functionalities, including integration with key applications, in an SAP BI Analytics space.      Lead architecture design reviews, the product roadmap and product strategy definition in their area.      Develop a deep understanding of Sanofi business processes and strategy through collaboration and regular engagement with key stakeholders and process owners.      Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, break high-level requirements into details, and distinguish user requests from underlying needs, translating these into documented architecture solutions.      Document systems and process requirements through meetings, workshops, and job shadowing.      Guide the development team to develop, configure and implement the solution as per the product development standards to meet business requirements.      Support development team with resolution of blocking issues and interdependencies and provide them architecture and design guidance.      Collaborate with other architects and business analysts to ensure end-to-end process integration and consistency, ensuring coverage of operational, statutory, and legal requirements.      Business continuity comes first: in the event of a crippling incident stopping business operations, able to manage the resolution as highest level of support within the company in their field.              About you( Profile):              8+ years of SAP BI experience in total with 2 + years of experience doing ERP delivery in a business-oriented context, preferably in an global company.     Extensive experience in implementing and maintaining SAP BW, Embedded Analytics(CDS Views) & BO(WEBI, LUMIRA, AFO or any other BI Tool).     Worked closely with Management to define strategy for these skills in at least one of the above areas      Should have good knowledge of functional modules like FI, SD, MM, PP, PM, eWM.      Significant team management experience, able to provide supervision, guidance and coaching to more junior employees working in the same field      ERP transformation experience in a global company      Executive-level communication and engagement skills, both written and verbal      Strong configuration experience, ability to determine when to use configuration vs. code as well as advanced troubleshooting skills      Ability to translate functional specifications into technical design documents, provide efforts and cost estimates, and manage delivery the desired functionality      Maintain high level of quality while working on complex problems under pressure and deadlines      Provide guidance to Data Migration teams with master data & transactional data loads      Project management experience; continuous improvement skills and mindset      Experience with multi-geography, multi-tier service design and management.      Deep understanding of Application and technology Architecture.      Knowledge of SAP S/4 HANA is important      Knowledge of agile ways of working is a plus      Knowledge of current ERP software trends in their area of expertise      Knowledge of Snowflake and IICS for integration is a plus.                 Soft Skills:              Demonstrated conflict resolution & problem-solving skills in a global environment.      Strong appetite to learn and discover      Adaptable and open to change      Company-first mindset: able to put the interests of the company before their own or those their teams if applicable.      Excellent analytical skills: able to frame and formalize problem statements and formulate robust solution proposals clearly and concisely      Autonomous and Results-driven      Role model our 4 values: teamwork, integrity, respect, courage                  Education   : Bachelor s Degree or equivalent in Information Technology or Engineering            Languages   : Strong written & verbal communication in English

column2: About Us: Airtel is a leading telecom solutions provider in the country with over 350m subscribers. Our endeavour to keep building a value chain for our customers gives us various problem statements to solve for. We as an Organization strongly believe in data driven decision making and thrive on solving complex business problems with Analytics & Data Science. This role will be leading analytics for 1-2 business verticals. You will be expected to show high sense of ownership to drive data driven decision making with senior management. We are committed to data-driven decision-making, innovation, and solving complex problems. We are seeking an experienced Senior Leader to join our team, leading analytics at the highest level within the organization, driving efficiency, and delivering impactful insights. Job Description: This position requires a candidate with a profound understanding of the telecom industry, coupled with the ability to build and lead high-performing teams. The ideal candidate should possess a strong analytical mindset, excel in data-driven decision-making, and thrive in solving complex problems. Key Responsibilities: 1. **Deep Understanding of Telecom Business:** - Develop and maintain an in-depth understanding of the telecom business, staying abreast of industry trends and dynamics. 2. **Team Management:** - Lead and manage high-performing teams, demonstrating the ability to identify and nurture talent within the industry. - Motivate teams to collaborate effectively and achieve common goals. 3. **Cross-Functional Alignment:** - Align teams across different verticals, such as business and marketing, towards common solutions. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define problem statements, build hypotheses, collect data, and develop analytics models. 4. **Urgency and Problem-Solving:** - Demonstrate a sense of urgency and the ability to dive deep into problem statements. - Lead the identification of opportunity areas with a high level of confidence. 5. **Metric Definition and Ownership:** - Set and define metrics for the business, taking end-to-end ownership of the analytics process. - Conduct A/B testing and build hypotheses to drive data-driven decision-making. 6. **Collaboration with Product and Implementation:** - Collaborate with the Product team for data tracking and implementation of tools like Clickstream, Google Analytics, Branch, and Moengage. 7. **Representation at the Highest Level:** - Represent analytics at the highest levels of the company, providing strategic insights and solutions during times of chaos. 8. **Leadership and Efficiency:** - Lead analytics for multiple lines of business. - Structure real-time conversations and forward-thinking to identify areas for driving efficiency. - Build roadmaps and drive execution of team objectives. 9. Data-Driven Decision Making: Drive data-driven decisions by setting and defining key metrics for the business and taking end-to-end ownership of data-driven insights. 10. High Sense of Urgency: Ensure business priorities are on top of mind and delivered. Qualifications: Minimum 10 years of experience in core analytics, with a strong background in SQL, Python, Airflow, Tableau, and other analytics tools. Data Expertise: Proficiency in working with large datasets, data structures, ETL pipelines, and feature modelling. Data Visualization: Excellent data visualization skills to effectively communicate complex insights to a broader audience. Problem Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to engage senior management with data-driven insights. Leadership: Proven ability to lead a team of analysts, fostering collaboration, and driving success. Communication: Effective communication skills, including the ability to work across multiple teams and engage with stakeholders at all levels. Forward Thinking: Ability to identify opportunities for efficiency and growth, building roadmaps and executing strategic plans.
column11: Data Analyst, Analytics, Product Analyst, SQL, Python

column2: We are looking for a team member to support our analytics team based out of US. Robust analytics is a priority for our businesses, as the product potential has major implications to a wide range of disciplines.      It is essential to have someone who understands and aspires to implement innovative analytics techniques to drive our insights generation across different franchises.      This role is responsible for executing global market research projects and managing a consistent, timely market research process across global products. This includes finalizing questionnaires, developing recruiting lists, aggregating data, interpreting results, cross-referencing secondary sources, and reporting findings      The role requires a close partnership with market researchers based in the US and EU, as well as external agencies that manage panels and collect data on our behalf.              People:     Maintain effective relationship with the end stakeholders within the allocated GBU and tasks - with an end objective to develop education and communication content as per requirement     Actively lead and develop SGH operations associates and ensure new technologies are leveraged     Initiate the contracting process and related documents within defined timelines; and     Collaborate with global stakeholders for project planning and setting up the timelines and maintaining budget       Performance indicators:    Feedback from (end stakeholders) on overall satisfaction       Weightage:    20%         Performance:     Prepare dashboard on contract execution counts and in pipeline     Text analytics to automate Contract process content and create repository for frequently used legal clause     In collaboration with the Data Strategy team /Global Procurement/relevant Global functions and Global Legal colleagues, provide Legal input for commercial data contracts     Co-ordinate with Global Procurement, as needed, on the preparation of legal documentation for commercial data contracts and amendments     Attend and contribute to Global data contracting discussions and decisions, providing legal and business partner support     Draft, review and negotiate legal language in alignment with objectives for data acquisition/ use cases     Assist in negotiations necessary to ensure Sanofi s interests are protected and assist in preparing legal replies     Maintain the SharePoint site where all relevant contract documents are stored     Provide timely updates and alerts on next steps to be taken - renew, cancel, raise PO, etc.     Organize all data contracting background required to understand contract history     Draft terms of Agreements / Deals for contract extension, new and amendment.     Contract interpretation - ensuring the contract will deliver expected outcome and identify any problematic holes in Vendor contracts     Reports on contract implementation / execution status     Contract Repository organization                   Weightage:    30%         Process:     Support delivery of projects in terms of resourcing, coordination, quality, timeliness, efficiency, and high technical standards for deliveries made by the medical writing group, including scientific documents and clinical/medical reports     Secure adherence to compliance procedures and internal/operational risk controls in accordance with all applicable standards     Refresh report on frequency/cycle basis (weekly / monthly / quarterly / annually) ,  along with QC checks for each refresh     Use latest tools / technologies / methodologies and partner with internal teams to provide support on all sort of regular and adhoc business analytics activities like build, maintenance and enhancements of such systems     Ability to work cross-functionally, gather requirements, analyse data, and generate insights and reports that can be used by the GBU       Performance indicators:    Feedback from stakeholders on satisfaction with deliverables Adherence to plan/calendar       Weightage:    25%         Stakeholder:     Work closely with global teams and/ external vendors to ensure the end-to-end effective project delivery of the designated publication/medical education deliverables also to prioritize work and deliver on time-sensitive requests     Be able to provide and defend gathered intelligence, methodology, content, and conclusions to the global leadership in a clear, concise format       Performance indicators:    Feedback from stakeholders on satisfaction with deliverables       Weightage: 20%                     About you             Experience   : 8+ years of experience in pharmaceutical product market research and commercial analytics and data. Demonstrated leadership and management in driving innovation and automation leveraging advanced analytical techniques        Soft skills   : Strong learning agility; Ability to manage ambiguous environments, and to adapt to changing needs of the business; column2: This role is part of our Managed Services team to serve as the primary responder to security events within the Security Operations Center      The ideal candidate would have a strong problem-solving skills and analytics aptitude      This role participates in security posture monitoring and threat response activities and is directly responsible for troubleshooting security events      The preferred candidate will provide the initial analysis during security incidents, establishing the extent of the threat, business impacts and then advising and performing the most suitable course of action to contain and remedy the incident      The SOC Analyst must maintain a good knowledge of the threat landscape, help enhance current capabilities and provides support in the identification of new methods of detecting threats              Job Duties          Monitor security event platforms and follow incident playbook for first response, triage, potential resolution and participate in post mortem activities as required.      Conducts network monitoring and intrusion detection analysis using various network defense tools, such as intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), firewalls, host-based security systems (HBSS), Azure security and audit log management etc.      Provide proactive feedback to enable improvement of the current monitoring rules, based on information and knowledge/experience      Ability to react quickly, decisively and deliberately in high-stress, high-impact situations      Creates daily, weekly, and monthly report for Security Management Team      Performs front line response and escalation tasks and updates runbooks and procedures as needed      Compile statistics and contribute to the improvement and creation of playbooks      Use public cyber security resources (e.g. sites/blogs/podcasts) to stay up to date with latest news, threats, and security analysis tools          Education          High School Diploma or GED, required      Bachelors Degree from an accredited university, Information Technology or Computer Science major, preferred          Experience          Two (2) or more years experience within cloud technologies such as Azure, Azure Stack Azure Backups, AWS or similar cloud experience, required      Two (2) or more years experience of network protocols, configurations, or operations required      Two (2) or more years of experience in infosec, cybersecurity, system or networking, required      Ability to triage problems, design and identify solutions and appropriately escalate issues in fast-paced environment, required      Some Experience with EDR platform or SIEM Platform, required      Prior experience with help desk ticketing systems and service desk management tools, preferred          License(s)/Certification(s)          Any Security certifications, preferred (SC200 recommended)      Azure certifications, preferred (AZ104 recommended)      System / Networking certifications, preferred          Experience with three or more of the following, required          Information Security tools & packet analyses tools (e.g. CB, Wireshark)      Intrusion Detection (e.g. IDS/IPS tools)      Firewall troubleshooting experience      Strong Windows and Linux experience      Internet Protocols and Services (e.g. TCP/IP, FTP, HTTPS, SSH)      Networking infrastructure      Log analysis/ Windows event analysis communication skills      Excellent interpersonal and customer relationship skills      Capacity to work in a deadline-driven environment while handling multiple projects/tasks simultaneously with a column2: The job involves conducting industry and financial research and data analytics to support clients and contributing to internal knowledge building efforts. Typical projects will involve gathering, analyzing, synthesizing and presenting data using structured methodologies and frameworks. Projects may take couple of days to several weeks for completion Cost Analytics team benchmarks costs and operating margins for financial institutions. Costs are analyzed across cost types, financial market products, regions, etc. , using public sources, regulatory disclosures and proprietary models         ?       Primary Responsibilities and Activities:             Financial research of Global Investment Banks focusing on Business structure, cost reporting, profitability and cost initiatives.      Build, update and maintain Client Bank Business structure, Cost allocation methodology based on public/ private data sources and client feedback     Prepare initial Costs estimates across all cost types, products and regions     Update and review of reported to normalized costs reconciliation     Create data templates for clients based on client s reporting structure     Make adjustments to the central Costs model based on client s product and Costs structure     Identify Costs drivers for Cost types from public sources, e. g. , cost of property in key locations     Analyze the relationship between Costs drivers and reported/ estimated Cost by checking for a variance between them and reasons for the same     Create draft presentations for the clients along with team members     Participate in client calls along with team members and take meeting notes     Co-ordinate with other research delivery teams in India and Relationship across geography location for deliverables                              REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS         The successful candidate will have to demonstrate the following skills, experience and attributes likely to have been gained over two to four years relevant experience.      Prior experience of 2 to 4 years in financial research / analytics / FPA     Good understanding of cost allocation methodology in Investment Bank is an advantage     MBA or post graduate degree in finance, business management, statistics, economics or similar analytical fields.      Professional certifications like CMA, CFA, CA, ICWA etc. would be an added advantage.      Strong quantitative skills, an analytical mind and an ability to work with significant amounts of data, both numerical and qualitative     A good understanding of Financial Statements     Ability to take decisions while working with unstructured data and limited information     Responsible attitude and ability to complete tasks in a timely manner     Well-developed interpersonal and active listening skills     Sound knowledge of global capital markets products preferred     A strong degree of independence and self-motivation     Fluency in spoken and written English is essential     Excellent working skills with MS office tools, especially good at advanced Excel, PowerBI and PowerPoint     Working knowledge of professional information services like Bloomberg, Thomson Reuters etc preferred

column2: The IT organization is seeking to add a Salesforce BSA Manager with specific focus on Salesforce production support across multiple clouds i.e. Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud. Acting as a liaison between business and technology, creative problem solving, impeccable communication, people management and attention to detail are key skills expected in this role.  As part of the IT Business Applications team, you will lead a team dedicated to supporting, maintaining, and enhancing UKGS Salesforce solutions. Under your direct leadership, the team will be responsible for supporting, and enhancing existing solutions as well as implementing new solutions that enable an exceptional customer experience. You will collaborate with key business stakeholders to understand business goals and priority and align resources based on those needs. Working in conjunction with other IT Service Teams you will be accountable for the delivery of high quality, scalable end-to-end solutions that support the companys strategic goals.  Responsibilities include:  Manage a team of 4-6 Business Analysts. Manage the team that act as first line support for all incoming cases/tickets relating to UKGs Salesforce implementation. Help them close tickets where possible or triage to next level as needed. Develop a plan to reduce common incidents. Mentor and develop the teams skills in eliciting and documenting quality business requirements. Motivate team members to achieve team and individual goals. Create a collaborative environment that enables peak performance from team members. Develop and maintain a detailed understanding of solutions in the UKG Salesforce instance and understand both upstream and downstream integration points. Provide guidance on solution designs and act as an escalation point for solution design decisions, collaborating with the Application Solution Consultants and Technical Leads. Manage system license allocations, access, and permissions. Monitoring user usage and license costs against budget. Ensure that solutions support long-term corporate goals while delivering maximum incremental short-term benefits. Manage stakeholder relationships; understand business priorities and strategic initiatives. Provide input to the IT portfolio and Enterprise Systems Roadmap. Ensure all IT process standards are followed. Proactively recommend improvements for internal IT processes.  Qualifications Extensive experience leading a team of BSAs/System Admins. Competencies in team dynamics by leading and motivating to obtain desired results.  Excellent interpersonal and communication skills (written and verbal) with the ability to work closely and effectively with a diverse group of people and to establish and maintain effective and productive working relationships.  Well organized and effective time management skills to prioritize and manage multiple tasks at once to meet deadlines. Project management experience would be advantageous. High degree of professional confidence and presentation skills to represent IT-related concepts effectively with executive-level management. Thorough understanding of Salesforce clouds, mainly configuration. Hands-on experience with Salesforce platform is required. Salesforce Certifications Preferred: -oSystem AdministratoroSales Cloud ConsultantoService Cloud ConsultantoExperience Cloud ConsultantoBusiness Analyst Thorough understanding of one or more of the following IT methodologies:oWaterfalloSDLC oAgile oITIL

column2: We have an excellent opportunity available for an Associate Data Engineer to make a difference at Kraft Heinz      The Associate Data Engineer role lies within the newly created Analytics Centre of Excellence within the Global Business Services organization      The Analytics COE has been set up to build, maintain and enhance analytical products for our business to generate actionable insights from data and make better informed decisions      The individual for this position will be a technical engineer in the areas of data management, data quality, data governance, and data engineering      They will provide hands-on design, preparation, and development of data solutions for analytical products      They will create data assets based on business data requirements which will enable the development of analytical tools              Key Responsibilities            Design, deliver and maintain the appropriate data solution to provide the correct data for analytical development to address key issues within the organization        Collaborate with a cross-functional team to deliver high quality results (such as Tableau developers and analysts)      Develop and operate modern data architecture approaches to create data assets for the organization, putting data quality as the focus of all data solutions      Contribute to generic frameworks for data ingestion, data processing, and data integrations per business requirements      Extend DevOps capabilities for deploying data solutions      Ensure effective and timely delivery of project work, raising issues and risks in a timely manner to project manager to ensure appropriate actions can be taken to mitigate      Ensure effective and timely delivery of project work      Enforce best practices for data design, architecture, and implementation        Qualifications & Experience          Bachelor s Degree or higher in Computer Science, Statistics, Business, Information Technology, or related field (Master s degree preferred)        Experience in delivering and supporting data engineering capabilities and building enterprise data solutions and data assets        Experience with cloud services within Azure, AWS, or GCP platforms (preferably Azure)        Experience with analytical tools (preferably SQL, dbt, Snowflake, BigQuery, Tableau)        Experience with design and software programming development (preferably Python, Javascript and/or R) preferred        Experience with DevOps and CI/CD processes is a plus        Experience in Agile methodologies (certifications preferred)        Team Player with a positive attitude and ability to work across different business stakeholder and technical teams to accomplish complex task

column2: Driving traffic analytics at adidas e-commerce, you are responsible for delivering cutting-edge Analytical services to stakeholders, enabling them to make fact-based decisions. Based on internal & external data sources, you manage the creation and generation of tools, data capabilities, optimizations and insights that help adidas better understand the consumer, expand reach, increase customer engagement and advocacy, and ultimately drive traffic, conversion and sales. In collaboration with your team, you drive and execute planning and analytics strategy and services across Emerging Markets focusing on Digital Marketing Analytics, Traffic & Media measurement and optimization, working closely with e-com and Brand Activation team.                           Key Responsibilities:                                Digital Marketing Analytics                   :                                 Drive EM e-com traffic analytics (all level of macro and micro KPIs) for our Website, Apps and Digital Platforms / eMarketplaces.                                  Own and drive consolidation, measurement of results and optimization of traffic generation and related conversion and ROI/ROAS, aligning and developing a global-aligned reporting framework that evaluates dimensions such as awareness, engagement and purchasing behavior. Provide insights about adidas brand awareness and e-commerce performance.                                 Collaborate and support Performance Marketing Brand team, Digital Brand Activations team and e-com UX and CE teams to achieve the Premium Shopping Experience value proposition and relevant Personalization across all digital touch points, to support enhancements to traffic generation, site usability, content, marketing, and overall customer experience.                                 Closely collaborate with the e-com forecasting team to share findings and insights on Traffic, Media, aligning deep-dives for e-com channel forecasts, campaigns and pre-post mortems, traffic acquisition strategies & overall business objectives.                                 Conduct collection, tracking, mining and analysis of data and generation of fact-based insights, using a single data source.                                 Develop and implement data capabilities, consolidations and best practice toolsets and frameworks that allow continuous tracking and optimization of e-com organic and paid media traffic.                                 Identify, suggest and implement new opportunities to drive growth through traffic optimization.                                 Monitor and analyze market trends and competitor activities and derive conclusions for the growth and optimization of adidas digital traffic generation activities.                                 Drive Traffic analytics capabilities building through application of the full set of advanced analysis methodologies to optimize data analysis. This includes framing of business needs, data and KPIs exploration and benchmarking as well as descriptive, predictive and prescriptive modeling.                                 Provide stakeholders with actionable recommendations and calls for action based on your gathered KPIs analysis and insights. Drive the translation of gathered insights into engaging, actionable and easy to digest insights presentation and implementations to ensure KPIs gaps, risks and uplift are closed and targets are achieved.                                  Implement analytics tools/reporting framework within e-commerce to facilitate every decision maker access to the information needed in the shape needed dashboards, visualization tools, reports etc.                                  Support execution of online campaigns through effective analytics focusing on uncovering trends in traffic, KPIs, customer behavior and sales                                 Ensure tools and systems daily routines & activities, refresh, updates and scheduling.                                 Support deep-dives, ad-hoc analysis and contextual dashboards with relevant platforms and channels.                                  Develop and maintain a strong stakeholder network with high level of trust that facilitates action- ability of insights.                                 Advise stakeholders in your area of responsibility on digital analytics to define goals, select appropriate KPIs, monitor performance and derive trends and opportunities.                                 Keep the continuous development of the analytics practice in scope, including service portfolio evolution and constant screening of the ecosystem for new models, capabilities, partners or solutions.                                 Build a strong internal and external network, informing the adidas Digital Analytics community on the latest trends and technological advances.                               Requirements :                                                                 Degree with focus in Business, Finance, Economics, Math, Data Science or related field preferred, or equivalent combination of education and experience                                 Minimum 3-5 years of experience working in Digital Analytics, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Demand forecasting & planning, Data Science or equivalent experience                                     Advanced experience with digital marketing in a brand environment                                         Functional knowledge of e-commerce content, search engine optimization/marketing, user experience, analytics, core e-Commerce capabilities, CRM process/program, and overlaps/opportunities in relation to behavioral web data                                         Experience in traffic generation, in-house or at a leading traffic agency.                                     Experience in or familiarity with analytics platforms, especially in their integration or deriving insights requiring multiple sources                                 Industry: Ideally in apparel/fashion/shoes or internet                                  Knowledge & Soft Skills           :                                Deep knowledge of Digital and e-com analytics                                 Ability to efficiently work in a cross-functional organization, ability to develop influential and collaborative relationships with stakeholders from digital and non-digital disciplines on all levels                                 Excellent communication & negotiation skills, comfortable presenting complex topics to technical and non-technical audience both in person and remotely at various organizational levels                                 A passion for designing and creating new data capabilities, tools, and frameworks. Interest in back-of-house development of analytics capabilities. Devotion to accuracy, reliability, rigor, and user-focused design.                                 Meticulous, high attention to details                                 Creative and energetic team player who has a passion for delivering analytics, data, insights to drive outcomes for quantifiable improvements in business results and consumer satisfaction.                                 Broad understanding of and passion for the sports and fashion/entertainment industry                                 Hard Skills               :                                Advanced experience in Digital Analytics, BI, Financial, Digital tools                                 Hands-on experience with analytics, statistics, data visualization, and analytics tools and disciplines                                 Proficient in MS Office (with an emphasis on Excel), Alteryx or at least one querying language                                 Experience with process design and process improvements, automation, etc.                                 Proven project management skills, including the ability to lead projects or work on several projects simultaneously.                     Plus would be considered:                     Experience in forecasting and predictive models                                 Advanced experience with Analytics Blending & Visualization Tools (PowerBI, Tableau, MicroStrategy, Alteryx, SQL )                                 Advanced experience with traffic analytics tools, marketing & media KPIs and ROI                                 Advanced experience with reporting and digital marketing tools (GA 360, doubleclick, Adobe Analytics, SCV, propensity modelling etc).                                 Advanced experience Experience with Web Analytics and Native app (iOS/Android) analytics (Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Webtrends, Wetrekk, Amplitude, AppsFlyer, FireBase ).                                 Experience with Voice of the Customer tool (Martitz CX, Medallia, Qualtrics)                                 Experience with Advanced Analytics Tools/ language    (R, Python, SQL,etc )                                   Customer Experience Measurement (Tealeaf CEM, Clicktale, QM, Crazyegg)                                 Experience in relevant digital disciplines (e-com, Social, online communities, loyalty programs, CRM, SEO/SEM)                                 Experience with AB and Multi-variate testing tools preferred (e.g. Optimizely, VWO, Test & Target)                                     Fluent English both verbally and written

column2: Duration: 12 Months  Stipend: 50000/m  About the Role: We're searching for a talented and motivated Growth Hacking Specialist specializing in prospecting to join our team. As a key driver of lead generation, this role focuses on identifying and leveraging new growth opportunities to increase our customer base. Using a mix of innovative tactics, data analytics, and digital tools, you'll play a pivotal role in strategic outreach and refining the prospecting processes to enhance ROI and boost business growth. Key Responsibilities:   Develop and implement creative growth hacking strategies to identify new opportunities and generate high-quality leads. Conduct data-driven analysis to uncover growth trends, evaluate campaign performance, and refine outreach tactics. Utilize digital tools, automation platforms, and emerging technologies to optimize lead      generation efforts. Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to align growth hacking initiatives with overall business objectives. Continuously experiment with new approaches, from social media marketing to email campaigns and content marketing, to improve prospecting processes. Analyze customer behavior and segment markets to tailor strategies for maximum engagement and conversion. Monitor and report on key metrics to measure the impact of growth hacking initiatives and provide insights for future improvements. Who You Are: Innovative thinker with a  creative approach to problem-solving and growth. Strong analytical skills with experience in data-driven marketing and a proactive approach to leveraging insights. Tech-savvy, with proficiency in marketing automation tools, and data analytics software. Detail-oriented, able to manage multiple projects simultaneously, and adaptable in a fast-paced environment. Passionate about growth marketing and eager to explore new ways to expand the customer base. column2: Senior Senior Tableau Developer Work :: Remote/ hybrid Location: Magarpatta city Pune / Bangalore Job Description:  Gathering and normalizing data from multiple data sources  Create, test, and publish dashboards and reports, as well as schedule refreshes. Advanced level of experience in Tableau, and report/data mart modelling is must.  Advanced knowledge of Tableau server management is desirable. Primary Skills  Deliver full-cycle Tableau development projects, from business needs assessment and data discovery, through solution design, to delivery to internal stakeholders  Provide technical leadership and support across all aspects of Tableau development and use, from data specification development, through DataMart development, to supporting end-user dashboards and reports. Provide best practices and industry standards to guide BI strategy development.  Ensure a consistent design and/or approach for analytics across the business areas. column2: Role Overview : As a Data Migration Specialist within the insurance industry in the UK, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the seamless migration of data from Azure SQL to Salesforce platform. This position demands a strong technical acumen in Azure SQL along with exceptional communication skills to effectively liaise with various stakeholders including Business Analysts (BAs) based in London, project managers, and the insurance company's integration partner.  The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the entire data migration process, ensuring data integrity, and facilitating smooth communication between all parties involved. Key Responsibilities : Data Migration Planning and Execution : Lead the planning and execution of data migration activities from Azure SQL to Salesforce platform. Technical Expertise : Demonstrate proficiency in Azure SQL to efficiently extract, transform, and load (ETL) data into Salesforce. Stakeholder Communication : Act as a primary point of contact for stakeholders including BAs, project managers, and integration partners, ensuring clear and effective communication throughout the migration process. Data Integrity and Quality Assurance : Implement measures to maintain data integrity during migration and conduct thorough quality assurance checks to validate the accuracy of migrated data. Issue Resolution : Identify and address any technical issues or challenges encountered during the migration process in a timely manner, collaborating with relevant stakeholders to find effective solutions. Documentation and Reporting : Maintain comprehensive documentation of data migration processes, including migration plans, technical specifications, and issue logs. Generate regular progress reports for stakeholders and project teams. Required Skills and Qualifications : Proficiency in Azure SQL : Extensive experience working with Azure SQL databases, including data extraction, transformation, and loading processes. Salesforce Migration Experience : Previous experience in migrating data to Salesforce platform would be highly advantageous. Strong Communication Skills : Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively engage with stakeholders at various levels and communicate technical concepts in a clear and concise manner. Project Management Skills : Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneously, adhering to project timelines and deadlines. Analytical Thinking : Strong problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and resolve technical issues during data migration. Attention to Detail : Meticulous attention to detail to ensure data accuracy and integrity throughout the migration process. Team Collaboration : Proven ability to work collaboratively within cross-functional teams and build positive working relationships with colleagues and stakeholders. Preferred Qualifications :  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.  Relevant certifications in Azure SQL or Salesforce. Location - Hyderabad,ahmedabad,pune,chennai,kolkata.
column11: Data Migration, Azure, Data Integrity, Data Mining, ETL, SQL, Salesforce

column2: We are in search of a self-motivated, and experienced    Data Analytics Engineer    to join our Affinidi Elements team        In this role, you will work with global peers on teams dedicated to the design, development, testing, implementation, and integration of data-focused products and services, that are both developer, and consumer-facing      As a    Data Analytics Engineer    , you will be responsible for the development, prototyping and implementation of the data layers that power the next generation of data and identity products from Affinidi      Your expert skills in designing, architecting, and building quality systems will intersect with your hands-on coding, performance testing, and integration experience      This position reports to the Director of Engineering                What s in it for you:            Develop, implement, and maintain    best-in-class data/analytics pipelines and system as part of the core Affinidi Elements product offering        Prototype    , program and help ship the next generation of Affinidi Elements products that lets developers and consumers access data, services and data models seamlessly and securely      Build a    scalable web services architecture    that supports privacy-preserving data access, data cataloging, search and discovery, data transformation      Be    responsible for the development of innovative, nonstandard approaches    for knowledge discovery including the use of AI/ML        Develop features and improvements    to the broader Affinidi Elements product in a secure, well-tested, and performant way, primarily using Typescript, Python, R, Rust        Refine and optimize the implemented data processing methods    to provide more accurate results or remove inefficiencies or enhance the service offering      Troubleshoot, identify, and resolve technical data and analytics-related issues.      Drive    continual improvement    of the Affinidi Elements data and analytics solutions and systems for protection against evolving threats and efficiency        Analyze and interpret highly complex data    to arrive at actionable recommendations      Collaborate with Product Management and other stakeholders within Engineering to maintain a high bar for quality in a fast-paced, iterative environment        Solve technical problems with large scope and complexity    while you advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance        Craft code    that meets our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high-scale systems environment. Maintain and advocate for these standards through code review.      Confidently own moderate to significantly complex features and improvements with minimal guidance and support from other team members. Collaborate with the team on larger projects.        Mentor    other engineers, contribute to team and organizational improvements in processes and tooling          You will be a great match if you:          Have    10+ years of overall professional experience        Have    3-5 years of experience database development    and tools such as data mining, OLAP, ETL, data modelling, complex SQL queries, performance tuning, and Postgres database development (DDL, DML, stored procedures) -    (a must-have)        Have    extensive expertise in AWS cloud computing and native databases    , especially Redshift, as well as the various data processing tools in the AWS platform -    (a must-have)        Can demonstrate    hands-on experience building a data/analytics pipeline from the ground up    , as well as    hands-on experience working with data to power AI/ML training    and inference      Have experience with performance and optimization problems, a demonstrated ability to both diagnose and prevent such problems, and a desire to share your knowledge and scale through others      Enjoy working in a fast-paced startup environment where you can be    autonomous and experimental    , be part of a truly global team, and can work up and down the stack      Have    strong technical documentation skills    , including the C4 Model and Architectural Decision Records      Understand design patterns and have    working experience in developing and deploying microservices in the cloud    , and have a proven track-record in doing so      Care about privacy by design, security, testing, high-performance systems, and mentoring others, and have an inclination towards clear communication, inclusion and visibility          Bonus points:          Experience working cross-functionally, and across locations and timezones      Domain expertise in decentralized identity solutions      Experience in developing systems with cryptography requirements

column1: Sr Principal, Quantitative Analytics and Data Science
column2: The Senior Principal is a managerial position India B&D CoE. The selected incumbent will be part of the India B&D team managing quant researchers addressing cutting-edge strategic issues facing today s senior-most functional executives at leading global corporations.     Senior Principal will lead a team of 4 to 6 quantitative researchers responsible for conducting surveys, collecting, and analyzing data, creating data-based reports for clients, and generating data-based insights. The content you and your team create will serve the needs of CXO s and their teams operating globally.              ?       What you will do:            Design standardized data reports for clients that help them understand internal gaps as well as allow them to benchmark themselves against their peers.         Communicate and present analytical insights to clients and internal stakeholders that include senior practice leaders, subject matter experts and advisors.         Lead and promote best practice in design, execution, process & delivery of diagnostic and benchmarking products.         Own end-to-end creation, development, and analysis of large, complex, disparate data sets to identify actionable insights for senior executives.           Manage Benchmarking and Diagnostic product life cycle to increase utilization including:           Manage all aspects of in-life products, including customer feedback, requirements, and issues.         Develop the collateral and sales tools that support the selling process.         Providing vison for product life cycle.             Manage, nurture, and develop a team of diagnostic and benchmarking managers.         Build scalable team structures and processes - Create career paths and provide growth opportunities for high performers.         Manage quality and productivity of the teams projects, triage requests as appropriate, and manage day-to-day operations of the central team.         Provide thought leadership and mentorship to junior team members related to all aspects of fulfillment including survey design, administration, client walkthroughs, and insight generation.         Develop a First Team culture - work closely with peer managers to build trust, encourage teamwork and identify synergies to capitalize for highest impact.               What you will need:           MBA or a Postgraduate Degree from a recognized premier Institute in disciplines with a strong analytics component, including Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, Econometrics, Applied Microeconomics.         Minimum 8-10 years of experience at a leading survey-based research or consulting firm or as a practitioner who has played significant role in finance, operations, or procurement.         At least 18 months managerial experience with direct or indirect supervision responsibilities.               Who you are:        ?     We are looking for creative, analytically strong, articulate and self-motivated individuals who would like to develop a strong knowledge of the terrain along with building consultative problem-solving skills. Unlike management consulting, investment banking, or law, our strategic research positions do not depend on a special appetite or aptitude for sales or business development. Our search for talent is centered, without exception, on the ability to run deep on a logical, philosophical, or economic problem and resurface with rigorous original insight.      ?       Some of the shared characteristics of our successful hires include:           Desire and ability to assume a leadership role in a collaborative, fast-paced multi-cultural environment.         Experience working with survey-based data including management of surveys, benchmarking data and or panel surveys, conducting quantitative analysis, managing benchmarking surveys.         Should have strong project management experience demonstrating the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.         People management skills - Managing teams in a matrix reporting environment.         Good oral and written communication skills a must for this role.               What we offer:           Competitive base salary             Great on job learning             A great work culture

Key aspects of the role:  Work with Product Owners, business users and functional / technical experts to translate business opportunities into a high level, technical, analytics and automation solutions. Excellent Exposure to Various Telecom Process and Experience with Various CRM, OSS/ BSS, and Automation Suites. Excellent stakeholder management skills with experience of working with a broad cross section of business users. Can bring high energy and has a strong sense of ownership. column2: Analytics Manager, Media (Remote)   Experience:  7+ years Salary:  INR 4,04,761 / month Expected Notice Period : 2 to 4 Weeks Shift : 11:00AM to 7:00PM IST Opportunity Type:  Remote Placement    Type:  Permanent   (*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)   What do you need for this opportunity? Primary Skills : Machine Learning, Display Video 360, Strong Business Acumen, Advanced SQL, Campaign Manager 360, Digital Media Platforms, Google Ad Manager (GAM), Media Analytics, Power BI, Looker, Or Domo, Predictive Modeling Assessment:  Role based AI Screening covering Communication and Technical Skills   Our Hiring Partner is Looking for: Analytics Manager, Media (Remote) who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.   Roles & Responsibilities About Role: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Manager of Media Analytics to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep expertise in SQL, Tableau, stakeholder management, and possess strong business acumen. The primary responsibility of the Manager, Media Analytics will be to lead our media analytics team in analyzing data to provide actionable insights that drive strategic decision-making and optimize media performance. Responsibilities: Utilize advanced SQL skills to extract, manipulate, and analyze data from various sources to derive actionable insights. Develop and maintain Tableau dashboards and reports to visualize and communicate analytical findings effectively to stakeholders. Lead stakeholder management efforts by collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements, priorities, and objectives. Apply strong business acumen to translate analytical insights into actionable recommendations that drive media strategy and performance improvements. Prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality analytics solutions. Mentor and coach junior team members, providing guidance and support to foster their professional development. Establish and maintain data pipelines to ensure efficient and accurate data collection, processing, and storage. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in media analytics and technology to drive continuous improvement and innovation within the team.   Requirements:  Bachelors degree in a relevant field such as Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or related quantitative discipline. Minimum of 7 years of experience in data analytics, with at least 1 year of experience in media analytics. Proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis. Expertise in Tableau for developing interactive dashboards and reports. Strong stakeholder management skills with the ability to effectively communicate analytical findings to non-technical audiences. Demonstrated business acumen with the ability to translate data insights into actionable recommendations. Experience in creating and maintaining data pipelines for efficient data processing. Prior experience in team management or leadership role is required. Excellent problem-solving skills with a strong attention to detail and accuracy. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities effectively. Preferred Qualifications: 1+ years at a publisher, media agency or ad technology provider Knowledge of Google Ad Manager (GAM) and its data. Knowledge of Campaign Manager 360, Display Video 360, Google Analytics would be ideal. Familiarity with digital media platforms and advertising technologies. Masters degree in a relevant field. Experience with other data visualization tools such as Power BI, Looker, or Domo. Knowledge of advanced analytics techniques such as predictive modeling, segmentation, or machine learning. Non-negotiable Skills: Tableau is a non-negotiable for these roles. Minimum 1-year experience of Media Analytics is non-negotiable. Engagement Type: TripAdvisor is hiring. Payroll and Compliance to be managed by: KaamWork Job Type: Permanent. Location: Remote How to apply for this opportunity? Register or login on our portal & fill out the application Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on Apply to get shortlisted Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client Crack a quick interview with our client Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!   About our Hiring Partner: Tripadvisor, the world's largest travel guidance platform*, helps hundreds of millions of people each month** become better travelers, from planning to booking to taking a trip. Travelers across the globe use the Tripadvisor site and app to discover where to stay, what to do and where to eat based on guidance from those who have been there before. With more than 1 billion reviews and opinions of nearly 8 million businesses, travelers turn to Tripadvisor to find deals on accommodations, book experiences, reserve tables at delicious restaurants and discover great places nearby. As a travel guidance company available in 43 markets and 22 languages, Tripadvisor makes planning easy no matter the trip type.   About Uplers: Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.    ( Note:  There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).    So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

column2: As an Analytics Engineer at Vanderlande youll be at the forefront of driving data-driven solutions and shaping the future of our organization by working on the data platform. Your key responsibilities will involve translating business needs into functional requirements, designing and developing data products, pipelines, and reports, and analyzing data to solve use cases resulting in optimized business processes and fact-based decision-making.         As being part of a cross functional full-stack team, together with your colleagues you are responsible for the creation and delivery of an end-to-end solution to our business stakeholders. In this role, you are a tech-savvy, action-oriented, and collaborative colleague who can wear multiple hats - part Data Engineer, - part Data Analyst and even though you have an area of expertise, you can fulfil each of those roles up to a certain point.         On a day-to-day basis, you will focus on creating and maintaining data products, data pipelines using Python, PySpark and SQL, and dashboards using tools like Qlik, or Power BI. Working in an Agile environment, proactively contributes to scrum events ensuring seamless coordination with the team and swift adaptability to changing priorities. They thrive in a fast-paced, iterative development environment, where constant feedback and continuous improvement are key.           In this role, you:             Translate business needs into functional requirements providing essential information on business use cases.         Translate functional requirements into thorough and feasible data products, analytics solutions and dynamic dashboards;         Utilize Python, PySpark, SQL, or R for data retrieval and manipulation.         Develop, test, and maintain data products, pipelines by the use of the Azure stack and Databricks, ensuring data reliability and quality.         Design and implement architectures for efficient data extraction and transformation.         Work on creating and maintaining landing zones in the data platform.         Actively participate in and contribute to Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) practices, ensuring smooth and efficient development and deployment processes within the data platform         Integrate data pipelines and reports into testing frameworks, allowing for rigorous performance testing and validation to ensure seamless performance.         Monitor and maintain data pipeline stability, offering support when required.         Analyze, interpret, and visualize data to drive business process optimization and fact-based decision-making.         Create, deploy, and maintain interactive dashboards and visualizations using Qlik or Power BI.         Perform a comprehensive analysis and proactively implement solutions to assess and enhance data quality and data reliability.         Actively participate in delivery execution on the Data Platform         You are eager to improve yourself and strive for continuous enhancement of processes and development within the data platform.         Stay updated with the latest developments in the analytics field and share knowledge with the team.                   Your qualifications and skills           If you re an experienced, enthusiastic and versatile Analytics Engineer, you will bring:           Minimum bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).             0-3 years of prior experience working as an Analytics Engineer or in a similar role .         Ability to work effectively as part of a cross-functional international full stack team, collaborating with other developers, and stakeholders.         Practical experience in writing code in Python, PySpark, SQL, or R for data retrieval and manipulation is a strong preference.         Demonstrated experience and proficiency in working with Azure Stack and Databricks is required for this role.         Proficiency or interest in using DevOps practices and tools for continuous integration, continuous delivery (CI/CD), and automated deployment of data products and data pipelines         Strong communication skills to effectively convey complex technical concepts in a clear and understandable manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.         Enthusiastic, proactive, driven, and actively seeking opportunities for personal development and growth.         Demonstrated curiosity and commitment to staying updated with the latest trends, tools, and best practices in the data & analytics field.         Familiar with agile methodologies and thrives in its dynamic and collaborative environment.         Knowledge of visualization tools like Power BI or Qlik is plus.
