column2: This is a diverse role that sits under FP&A and covers a spectrum of BI systems solutions, associated with the delivery of BI to a wide range of users.          You will be expected to enhance, maintain, and support the BI solutions which are currently run in an Azure Services environment. You will be expected to work for the Head of FP&A and with the guidance of the Senior Financial Analyst/Developer, to maintain the current system architecture and help drive the future state of the solution with the Business requirements.                     Main Tasks and Responsibilities:                 Operational                   Requirements Lifecycle Management           o      Maintain requirements so that they remain correct and current after an approved change.             Ensure requirements are traced through their entire lifecycle (i.e. from inception to implementation in the solution) via a Requirements Traceability Matrix (RTM) or equivalent document.               Specification and Documentation           o      Document requirements aligned with Gentrack Requirements Guidelines for complex and large projects or functional areas.               Requirement Analysis and Design Definition           o      Able to clearly articulate complex requirements.         o      Ensure that the requirements fully achieve the intended objectives.         o      Identify and communicate assumptions, constraints and dependencies that affect the solution.         o      Defines requirements to support transition to new solution.               Elicitation and Collaboration           o      Select appropriate requirements elicitation technique/s subject to project and/or stakeholder concerned.         o      Control and guide requirement elicitation.         o      Applies active listening and para phrasing to ensure accurate information is captured.                   Financial Management                 Some knowledge of Accounting Systems.             ERP Knowledge.             Development of Reports.                 Compliance             To abide to the Compliance Policies and Procedures of the Company.                 Occupational H&S                 Take reasonable care of your own and other people s Health & Safety in the workplace.             Report hazards in your work or in your work environment that may be putting your or anyone else s Health & Safety at risk.                 Additional Tasks             In addition to this you are required to carry out any other duties as reasonably requested by your Manager.                 Person Specification:                 Experience / Knowledge                 Knowledge of best practice software development methodologies and Agile practices.             Experience in using latest techniques and software for systems developments.             8+ year s Commercial Software knowledge, preferably with Azure Data Factory, Visual Studio and Excel.             8+ years Programing experience of SQL.             Time spent working in team environments, particularly in Financial or Business delivery environments.             Previous experience working with databases particularly Microsoft SQL Server.             Demonstrated knowledge of technologies, such as SSMS, Azure Data factory and SQL.             Knowledge of ERP or/ and CRM.                 Personal Attributes                 Analytical Thinking         o      Break complex information into categories, themes or parts autonomously.         o      Adopt an analytical, logical and objective approach towards tasks, making decisions and setting priorities.             Proactively thinks ahead of potential issues and mitigation plans.              A passion for excellence and a commitment to be the best.              High levels of energy, sound judgement and determination to achieve with a sense of urgency.             Excellent relationship management and interpersonal skills.              An open minded consultative approach.              Ability to give and receive positive and constructive feedback.             Ability to creatively solve problems.             Ability in managing the demands of a rapidly evolving environment.             Excellent attention to detail and strong communication skills.                 Qualifications / Education             (highly desirable)             Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science, Maths, Physics or other numerate subject. Software Engineering or comparable professional development and commercial experience.     .                 Competency Description           (1= Low & 5 = High)                   Adaptability             Maintaining effectiveness when experiencing changes in work tasks or the work environment; adjusting effectively to work within new work structures, processes, requirements or cultures.         Level 4                 Analytical Thinking             Understanding a situation and its pieces, analysing its make-up and reaching logical decisions on a rational basis.         Level 4                 Building Partnerships         Identifying opportunities and taking action to build relationships both within the organisation and externally to achieve common goals.         Level 4                 Communication             Clearly conveying information and ideas through a variety of media in a way that engages people and helps them understand and retain the message.         Level 4                 Customer Focus             Making customers and their needs a primary focus of one s actions; developing and sustaining productive customer relationships.         Level 4                 Decision Making             Using effective approaches for choosing a course of action or developing appropriate solutions and taking action that is consistent with available facts, constraints and probable consequences.         Level 4                 Planning and Organising             Establishing courses of action for self and others to ensure that work is completed efficiently.         Level 4                 Process improvement & Innovation             Improving existing conditions and processes; identifying opportunities, implementing solutions and measuring output.         Level 4

column2: Driving traffic analytics at adidas e-commerce, you are responsible for delivering cutting-edge Analytical services to stakeholders, enabling them to make fact-based decisions      Based on internal & external data sources, you manage the creation and generation of tools, data capabilities, optimizations and insights that help adidas better understand the consumer, expand reach, increase customer engagement and advocacy, and ultimately drive traffic, conversion and sales      In collaboration with your team, you drive and execute planning and analytics strategy and services across Emerging Markets focusing on Digital Marketing Analytics, Traffic & Media measurement and optimization, working closely with e-com and Brand Activation team              Key Responsibilities:            Digital Marketing Analytics        :          Drive EM e-com traffic analytics (all level of macro and micro KPIs) for our Website, Apps and Digital Platforms / eMarketplaces.          Own and drive consolidation, measurement of results and optimization of traffic generation and related conversion and ROI/ROAS, aligning and developing a global-aligned reporting framework that evaluates dimensions such as awareness, engagement and purchasing behavior. Provide insights about adidas brand awareness and e-commerce performance.          Collaborate and support Performance Marketing Brand team, Digital Brand Activations team and e-com UX and CE teams to achieve the Premium Shopping Experience value proposition and relevant Personalization across all digital touch points, to support enhancements to traffic generation, site usability, content, marketing, and overall customer experience.          Closely collaborate with the e-com forecasting team to share findings and insights on Traffic, Media, aligning deep-dives for e-com channel forecasts, campaigns and pre-post mortems, traffic acquisition strategies & overall business objectives.          Conduct collection, tracking, mining and analysis of data and generation of fact-based insights, using a single data source.          Develop and implement data capabilities, consolidations and best practice toolsets and frameworks that allow continuous tracking and optimization of e-com organic and paid media traffic.          Identify, suggest and implement new opportunities to drive growth through traffic optimization.          Monitor and analyze market trends and competitor activities and derive conclusions for the growth and optimization of adidas digital traffic generation activities.          Drive Traffic analytics capabilities building through application of the full set of advanced analysis methodologies to optimize data analysis. This includes framing of business needs, data and KPIs exploration and benchmarking as well as descriptive, predictive and prescriptive modeling.          Provide stakeholders with actionable recommendations and calls for action based on your gathered KPIs analysis and insights. Drive the translation of gathered insights into engaging, actionable and easy to digest insights presentation and implementations to ensure KPIs gaps, risks and uplift are closed and targets are achieved.          Implement analytics tools/reporting framework within e-commerce to facilitate every decision maker access to the information needed in the shape needed dashboards, visualization tools, reports etc.          Support execution of online campaigns through effective analytics focusing on uncovering trends in traffic, KPIs, customer behavior and sales          Ensure tools and systems daily routines & activities, refresh, updates and scheduling.          Support deep-dives, ad-hoc analysis and contextual dashboards with relevant platforms and channels.          Develop and maintain a strong stakeholder network with high level of trust that facilitates action- ability of insights.          Advise stakeholders in your area of responsibility on digital analytics to define goals, select appropriate KPIs, monitor performance and derive trends and opportunities.          Keep the continuous development of the analytics practice in scope, including service portfolio evolution and constant screening of the ecosystem for new models, capabilities, partners or solutions.          Build a strong internal and external network, informing the adidas Digital Analytics community on the latest trends and technological advances.          Key Relationships:          EM Hub e-com team          EM Function teams (Finance, DNA, Brand, Sales, SCM )          Country-Clusters (C/C) e-commerce teams          Country-Clusters (C/C) market teams & group functions          Global Digital teams          Global BI & Analytics teams          External vendors            Requisite Education and Experience / Minimum Qualifications:          Experience in Marketing Analytics, Attribution, etc, challenging the status quo          Great communication skills & command over the language          Degree with focus in Business, Finance, Economics, Math, Data Science or related field preferred, or equivalent combination of education and experience          Minimum 3-5 years of experience working in Digital Analytics, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Demand forecasting & planning, Data Science or equivalent experience          Advanced experience with digital marketing in a brand environment          Functional knowledge of e-commerce content, search engine optimization/marketing, user experience, analytics, core e-Commerce capabilities, CRM process/program, and overlaps/opportunities in relation to behavioral web data          Experience in traffic generation, in-house or at a leading traffic/media agency.          Experience in or familiarity with analytics platforms, especially in their integration or deriving insights requiring multiple sources          Industry: Ideally in apparel/fashion/shoes or internet          Knowledge & Soft Skills    :        Deep knowledge of Digital and e-com analytics          Ability to efficiently work in a cross-functional organization, ability to develop influential and collaborative relationships with stakeholders from digital and non-digital disciplines on all levels          Excellent communication & negotiation skills, comfortable presenting complex topics to technical and non-technical audience both in person and remotely at various organizational levels          A passion for designing and creating new data capabilities, tools, and frameworks. Interest in back-of-house development of analytics capabilities. Devotion to accuracy, reliability, rigor, and user-focused design.          Meticulous, high attention to details          Creative and energetic team player who has a passion for delivering analytics, data, insights to drive outcomes for quantifiable improvements in business results and consumer satisfaction.          Broad understanding of and passion for the sports and fashion/entertainment industry          Hard Skills    :        Advanced experience in Digital Analytics, BI, Financial, Digital tools          Hands-on experience with analytics, statistics, data visualization, and analytics tools and disciplines          Proficient in MS Office (with an emphasis on Excel), Alteryx or at least one querying language          Experience with process design and process improvements, automation, etc.          Proven project management skills, including the ability to lead projects or work on several projects simultaneously.          Hands-on Advanced experience in tools (GA 360, Adobe Analytics) is a must          Advanced experience with mobile app measurement platforms (iOS/Android Appsflyer/ Adjust/ etc)          Experience in relevant digital disciplines (e-com, Social, online communities, loyalty programs, CRM, SEO/SEM)          Advanced experience with Analytics Blending & Visualization Tools (PowerBI, Tableau, MicroStrategy, Alteryx, SQL )          Plus would be considered:          Experience in forecasting and predictive models          Experience with Advanced Analytics Tools/ language    (R, Python, SQL,etc )            Advanced experience with traffic analytics tools, marketing & media KPIs and ROI          Advanced experience with reporting and digital marketing SCV, propensity modelling etc).          Experience with Voice of the Customer tool (Martitz CX, Medallia, Qualtrics)          Customer Experience Measurement (Tealeaf CEM, Clicktale, QM, Crazyegg)          Experience with AB and Multi-variate testing tools preferred (e.g. Optimizely, VWO, Test & Target)          Fluent English both verbally and written                COURAGE:    Speak up when you see an opportunity; step up when you see a need..            OWNERSHIP:    Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through.            INNOVATION:    Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things.            TEAMPLAY:    Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset.            INTEGRITY:    Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company s standards.            RESPECT:    Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all.

column2: In the current economic environment, organizations need to respond quickly to changes effecting their performance, bottom line and long term viability      For organizations with an existing investment in    SAP    and    Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)    solutions, leveraging the capabilities of an      SAP Analytics        SAP Business Intelligence (BI)    product can provide visibility from the boardroom to the warehouse for all levels of staff to manage more effectively              SAP Mobility BI (Business Intelligence)        Our SAP Mobile BI delivers real-time visibility into big data with a secure, immersive mobile experience that features interactive visuals and intuitive search. One can access the BI to take critical decisions anytime, anywhere and on any device. You will manage projects across functions to integrate -global and local- projects into the portfolio while also playing a key role in any acquisition process to support the country manager.  Your future employer -  A global innovator in discreet healthcare solutions, this organization pioneers advanced medical devices, prioritizing dignity and independence for individuals facing intimate healthcare challenges.  Responsibilities -   Overseeing the implementation and monitoring of a business intelligence model to drive customer segmentation, targeting as well as CRM program.  Driving salesforce effectiveness initiatives & executing the global commercial excellence strategy. Creating value propositions to support and build competitive advantage in cooperation with marketing & sales functions.  Translating strategic objectives into operational plans.  Supporting the country manager in business development by providing insights and competitive intelligence.  Driving continuous improvement by setting KPIs & objectives for the team and undertaking performance evaluations.  Overseeing the local deployment of the global commercial strategy. Global exposure and engagement. This position is based at our Bengaluru office.

column2: As the Analytics Manager, you will play a vital role in MDS R&D Digital team supporting the initiatives within the Research and Development (R&D) function of our company     You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including R&D, marketing, supply chain, and finance, to drive the data strategy and empower R&D teams with actionable insights that accelerate product development cycles, enhance decision-making, and ultimately contribute to Mondelezs mission of delighting consumers around the world     This position offers an exciting opportunity to work in a dynamic environment working in close partnership with the business leadership team and manage the vision and analytics roadmap in your area of responsibility             How you will contribute               ?       The Manager, Analytics is a member of the    Mondelez Digital Services (MDS) Digital R&D team and     will be expected to:           Work with the R&D MDS & business stakeholders to support the R&D data analytics initiatives, developing roadmap & ensuring alignment with R&D strategies and objectives.     Propose state-of-the-art solutions which fit into the overall Data and Analytics strategy and solutions architecture.     Oversee the data ingestion & analysis of R&D data to uncover actionable insights and opportunities for optimization.     Responsible for the entire delivery lifecycle of all projects for R&D within the Data and analytics space with managing the project budget, business use case and functional scope, build quality, deployment schedule and operational readiness for all processes in the delivery scope.     Own the relationship with the external partners, enabling vendors to interpret & translate requirements during design, delivering the product solutions ensuring that solutions comply to Mondel z standards and ensuring successful transition of solution for business-as-usual support.     Collaborate with IT and data teams to identify and resolve data-related issues, streamline data processes, and enhance data accessibility for analytical purpose.     Champions the use of Agile practices throughout a solution lifecycle (from proof of concept to pilot) as well as project management practices to scale solutions             Job Specific Requirements:         bachelors Degree is required. Certification in data analysis or related fields (eg, Certified Analytics Professional) is a plus.     8+ years relevant experience ideally in CPG Industry with experience in managing cross-functional teams or projects, influencing key stakeholders.     Strong project management experience - demonstrated ability to launch and deliver multiple, concurrent IT projects on time and within budget successfully.     Excellent communication skills to convey complex technical concepts clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.     Demonstrated leadership capabilities, including the ability to inspire and develop a high-performing team, drive strategic initiatives, and deliver results in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.     Demonstrated expertise in both Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Microsoft Azure     Experience & Knowledge of big data solutions like Google BigQuery, Azure Databricks     Strong technical proficiency in data visualization tools ie, Tableau, Power BI to analyze data, create visualizations, and generate actionable insights.     Proficiency in data analysis tools and programming languages such as Python, or SQL.     Proven experience partnering with business functions and managing stakeholder expectations.     Proven experience in influencing others based on knowledge, experience, or key relationships.     Stay up to date with the latest developments and services in both GCP and Azure related to data and analytics.     Familiarity with version control systems (eg, Git) and DevOps practices in the context of cloud-based data projects.             Travel requirements:    Limited (up to 5%)

column2: A spectacular opportunity awaits those who are passionate about BI      We are looking for graduates, to be given training in both the domains mentioned      This will be followed by absorption if you are able to prove your competency over the duration of training      You may be a graduate in Engineering, Mathematics or Statistics      It will be a remote and online training program conducted directly from Kochi, India      Remember, all you need to prove is you are worthy of the role over the 3-month duration by showcasing your attitude, talent, skills, and EQ      The hands-on training program is completely free      You will start receiving the best-in-class salary after the training is done with and you are absorbed; by that time, you would have proven your mettle and suitability to our complete satisfaction      Please note that no payment will be provided over the training period to the candidates selected      We will impart you the requisite knowledge and exposure to an awesome work culture that will kickstart your career once and for ever      Candidates who complete the training to our satisfaction will be provided with a certificate of completion              Responsibilities        Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality      Interpreting data, analysing results using statistical techniques      Identify, analyse, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets      Filter and clean data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems      Work with the team to prioritize business and information needs      Acquiring data from primary or secondary data sources and maintaining databases            Key Skills Requirements        Analytical Skills: Business analysts work with large amounts of data: facts, figures, and number crunching. You will need to see through the data and analyse it to find conclusions      Communication Skills: Business analysts are often called to present their findings, or translate the data into an understandable document. You will need to write and speak clearly, easily communicating complex ideas      Critical Thinking: Business analysts must look at the numbers, trends, and data and come to new conclusions based on the findings      Attention to Detail: Data is precise, analysts have to make sure they are vigilant in their analysis to come to correct conclusions      Math Skills: Data analysts need math skills to estimate numerical data.      Adeptat queries, report writing and presenting findings      Conscious listening and storytelling skills      Ability to collaborate effectively and work as part of a team      Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analysing datasets (R, SPSS, SAS & Python) and visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI) is an added advantage.
column11: Training, Mathematics, Business intelligence, Statistics

column2: Role Overview: We are looking for candidates with strong analytical and English comprehension skills. The ideal candidate should have the ability to read, summarize, and break down large content into smaller logical blocks, conduct research online, validate claims made in the content through online research, and work with the LLM (Large Language Models) to solve puzzles! Your role is critical in helping fine-tune and improve large language models (like gpt), and will make you an expert on how to leverage AI to be a better analyst. This is your chance to future-proof your career in an AI-first world! What does day-to-day look like: You would spend time answering a variety of interesting analytical questions and creating scenarios that can train the LLM models to get better. Here are a couple of examples which models might get wrong and you would have to give the correct answer and explanation to enable the models to learn: Who is the best tennis player in the world? (Hint: Are you sure you are thinking holistically? Your mind may automatically go to Novak Djokovic, but think again! How would you define best, are you covering all genders?) In a small town, there are four distinct neighborhoods: Oak, Pine, Maple, and Elm. A postman is assigned to deliver mail and can only deliver to two neighborhoods in one day, with the following rules. If he delivers to Oak and Elm on the first day, which neighborhoods does the carrier deliver to on the second day : Oak is always visited before Pine. Maple cannot be visited on the same day as Elm. Pine must be visited on the same day as either Maple or Elm. Note: No other prior specialized domain experience is needed. Requirements: Ability to read and write in English and a high degree of comprehension skills. Ability to provide constructive feedback and detailed annotations. Creative and lateral thinking abilities. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Good research and analytical skills. Self-motivated and able to work independently in a remote setting. Ability to commit to 40 hours per week for the contract duration overlapping US hours. Desktop/Laptop set up with a good internet connection.  Preferred Qualifications: Bachelors degree or undergraduate in Engineering, Literature, Journalism, Communications, Arts, Statistics, or a related field. We are open to candidates who do not have a Bachelor's degree but have experience in the area. Experience writing professionally (business analysts, research analyst, copywriter, journalist, technical writer, editor, translator, etc.)  Multilingual capabilities, especially Spanish and Portuguese, aren?? mandatory, but an advantage. Understanding of Excel and Google Suite. Benefits: Competitive compensation based on experience and expertise. Flexible working hours and remote work environment. Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI projects with leading LLM companies. Potential for contract extension based on performance and project needs.  Application Process: Shortlisted candidates will be sent an automated challenge (40 mins). Once you clear the challenge, we will reach out to you for an interview. Once you clear the interview, you are ready to go! From start to finish, the process will take less than a week.
column11: Analytical Research, Secondary Research, Technical Writing

column2: A growing operational analytics team is looking for a capable data engineer that can work in a fast-paced and agile environment     The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with establishing data pipelines, analyzing data, working with the business to mitigate or remediate data quality issues, developing data models, and providing general data warehouse support     The right fit for this role will be a self-starter and a great communicator, and they must have a passion for empowering business users to harness the available data to derive meaningful insights to make sound business decisions           WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING         Participate in an agile team focused on quality and quick time-to-value delivery, and consistently show initiative to problem solve while following best practices     Work with application administrators and business stakeholders to identify data that needs to be synced from the target application     Develop, implement, and monitor stored procedures     Establish and maintain secure, cost-efficient, and technically-efficient EL and ETL data pipelines, following best practices     Implement data models that follow best practices and support data warehouse extensibility     Review incoming data for completeness and accuracy and implement ongoing automated data completeness/accuracy checks     Identify data quality issues and work with stakeholders to mitigate or remediate quality issues     Where data gaps/inconsistencies cannot be corrected at the source, define ETL and ELT processes and models to cleanse data and report on ongoing quality issues, following best practices     Help automate manual processes wherever profitable to do so     Collaborate with other members of the analytics team to validate data. Support the quality testing of others on the team.     Administer and optimize a reliable, cost-effective, and scalable data warehouse     Effectively communicate the design, and intended use, of data models to BI developers.     Communicate details about data models to stakeholders in non-technical terms     Identify inconsistencies or trends in data that may impact business objectives and effectively communicate these to stakeholders     Participate in requirement gathering sessions, participate in design workshops, and maintain meaningful design documentation     Contribute to project planning, and adhere closely to planned delivery dates     Look beyond immediate requirements and design data models that are reusable and extensible     Ensure that all data is properly secured both while in-flight and at-rest.     Adhere to, and help enhance, quality control guidelines and procedures     Create and maintain meaningful and detailed documentation for consumers ranging from very technical to non-technical     Deploy monitoring processes to ensure data integrity remains high and that data flows are working properly     Show a willingness and desire to grow beyond existing skills           WHAT YOIU BRING         5-6 years experience developing and maintaining data warehouse solutions     2-3 years experience on BigQuery, Snowflake, Azure and/or Redshift Spectrum     2-3 years experience using economic thinking to minimize compute costs and maximize data retrieval efficiency     3-4 years experience working with BI technologies such as Tableau and PowerBI     3-4 years experience working in cloud infrastructure such as AWS & Azure     3-4 years experience working with data integration tools such as Fivetran, Talend, and Alteryx     3-4 years experience developing and documenting and implementing ETL and ELT processes     3-4 years experience in developing and working with APIs such as SOAP and REST, including modern authentication protocols such as SAML, OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect     3-4 years experience in developing/implementing Python scripts for purposes of integrating and processing data     2-3 years experience working in an agile team setting, focused on fast and high-quality delivery     Candidate must have excellent verbal and written communication skills (English)     Experience contributing as part of the data governance framework     Familiarity with ML and AI concepts and implementing ML projects     Experience reading and writing business process documentation, understanding how applications/data tie into those process, and helping to drive data and process improvement     Experience working with cloud applications such as Salesforce, FreshService, & Jira     Experience with various business domains such as sales, renewals, and customer relationship management     Available to work a flexible schedule to work with stakeholders in various timezones     (Preferred) Experience deploying scripts on Linux and Windows servers column2: Business Analysts play a crucial role in our organizations success by bridging the gap between business needs and technological solutions. Analysts are responsible for gathering and analyzing business requirements, identifying process improvements, and recommending effective strategies to drive operational efficiency and growth.      By collaborating with stakeholders across various departments, you will help shape our business initiatives and ensure they align with our overall goals and objectives.     Analysts have the opportunity to work closely with key stakeholders, including executives, department heads, and subject matter experts. Leveraging analytical skills and business acumen to understand complex business processes they identify areas of improvement, and propose innovative actionable solutions.         Your Impact:         Gather and analyze business requirements from stakeholders across different departments.     Develop data visualization and reporting using relevant tools (e.g., Tableau, Salesforce).     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business needs into actionable solutions.     Identify and define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of business initiatives.     Perform data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform business decisions.     Support project management activities, including project planning, resource allocation, and progress tracking.     Conduct feasibility studies and cost-benefit analyses for proposed business projects and initiatives.     Facilitate communication and collaboration between stakeholders, business users, and Data teams.     Provide training and support to end-users on new processes, systems, and tools.     Depending on the specialization area (e.g., marketing, product, sales, customer support), the Business Analyst may have additional specialist responsibilities related to their specific domain.         Your Experience:         Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field.     Proven experience as a Business Analyst or similar role, preferably in a high-paced B2B SaaS environment.     Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, and analyze large datasets.     Proficiency in using business analysis tools and methodologies.     Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey complex information to diverse stakeholders.     Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities.     Detail-oriented with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.     Familiarity with project management principles, practices and tools including Jira, & Asana.     Proficiency in data visualization and reporting tools (e.g., Tableau, Salesforce Einstein).     Knowledge of SQL and database concepts is desirable.
column11: Computer science, Data analysis, Business transformation, Business analysis, Project management, Customer support, Project planning, Operations, SQL, Salesforce

column2: The    Senior Manager, Digital & Transformation, Reporting and Analytics    Architect is responsible for strategizing and delivering analytical and reporting solutions across all process areas and systems at West Pharma        The role requires substantial technical expertise alongside the ability to collaborate with BI SMEs & business leads to understand business requirements and to implement optimal reporting solutions      In addition, this role must have in-depth technical skills on reporting tools like Power BI, SQL and other components like power apps, Flow, automate etc                Essential Duties and Responsibilities:                    Manages a team of 7 - 9 direct/indirect members globally to design and deliver reporting and analytical solutions using Power BI, Power Pivot, Power Query, SQL, and other latest technologies as needed. Occasional on-call work required.    Sedentary work, office environment

column1: Sr Principal, Quantitative Analytics and Data Science
column2: The Senior Principal is a managerial position India B&D CoE. The selected incumbent will be part of the India B&D team managing quant researchers addressing cutting-edge strategic issues facing today s senior-most functional executives at leading global corporations.     Senior Principal will lead a team of 4 to 6 quantitative researchers responsible for conducting surveys, collecting, and analyzing data, creating data-based reports for clients, and generating data-based insights. The content you and your team create will serve the needs of CXO s and their teams operating globally.              ?       What you will do:            Design standardized data reports for clients that help them understand internal gaps as well as allow them to benchmark themselves against their peers.         Communicate and present analytical insights to clients and internal stakeholders that include senior practice leaders, subject matter experts and advisors.         Lead and promote best practice in design, execution, process & delivery of diagnostic and benchmarking products.         Own end-to-end creation, development, and analysis of large, complex, disparate data sets to identify actionable insights for senior executives.           Manage Benchmarking and Diagnostic product life cycle to increase utilization including:           Manage all aspects of in-life products, including customer feedback, requirements, and issues.         Develop the collateral and sales tools that support the selling process.         Providing vison for product life cycle.             Manage, nurture, and develop a team of diagnostic and benchmarking managers.         Build scalable team structures and processes - Create career paths and provide growth opportunities for high performers.         Manage quality and productivity of the teams projects, triage requests as appropriate, and manage day-to-day operations of the central team.         Provide thought leadership and mentorship to junior team members related to all aspects of fulfillment including survey design, administration, client walkthroughs, and insight generation.         Develop a First Team culture - work closely with peer managers to build trust, encourage teamwork and identify synergies to capitalize for highest impact.               What you will need:           MBA or a Postgraduate Degree from a recognized premier Institute in disciplines with a strong analytics component, including Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, Econometrics, Applied Microeconomics.         Minimum 8-10 years of experience at a leading survey-based research or consulting firm or as a practitioner who has played significant role in finance, operations, or procurement.         At least 18 months managerial experience with direct or indirect supervision responsibilities.               Who you are:        ?     We are looking for creative, analytically strong, articulate and self-motivated individuals who would like to develop a strong knowledge of the terrain along with building consultative problem-solving skills. Unlike management consulting, investment banking, or law, our strategic research positions do not depend on a special appetite or aptitude for sales or business development. Our search for talent is centered, without exception, on the ability to run deep on a logical, philosophical, or economic problem and resurface with rigorous original insight.      ?       Some of the shared characteristics of our successful hires include:           Desire and ability to assume a leadership role in a collaborative, fast-paced multi-cultural environment.         Experience working with survey-based data including management of surveys, benchmarking data and or panel surveys, conducting quantitative analysis, managing benchmarking surveys.         Should have strong project management experience demonstrating the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.         People management skills - Managing teams in a matrix reporting environment.         Good oral and written communication skills a must for this role.               What we offer:           Competitive base salary             Great on job learning             A great work culture
column11: Procurement, Project management, Analytical, Management consulting, Investment banking, Econometrics, Information technology, Principal, Analytics, Recruitment

column2: Develop a data strategy to quickly cultivate a data-driven culture across the organization     A successful data strategy will optimize our business performance by identifying growth opportunities and highlighting areas for improvement     To be successful in this role, candidates must have demonstrated experience in organizing data in a way that allows business leaders to make informed decisions and reach their full potential by leveraging timely and accurate data     The role will proactively communicate with stakeholders, team members and partners to support a high-performing team responsible for providing sales intelligence and data visualizations by leveraging business intelligence tools     The Senior Manager is expected to execute this strategy by hiring and managing a team with diverse specializations located in India     Their team will include business analysts, SQL developers, report writers and sales data / platform administrators that can deliver on the vision that the Senior Manager aligns with stakeholders across the business     Despite this being a role with people management responsibility, the Senior Manager is expected to be hands-on, and understand the functions and responsibilities that they will hire for end-to-end     This will allow the Senior Manager to train and support their future team effectively     The ideal candidate will be able to deliver results, take ownership of work and outputs, find a way to work through barriers, and work efficiently     we're looking for someone to think analytically about the business, have a critical eye for detail, and have high expectations and standards               Responsibilities          Coordinate and align priorities with the organizations strategic goals, partnering with business leadership to identify data and analytical needs.     Lead the sales intelligence strategy in that combines business analytics and data visualization to make profitable, data-driven decisions.     As a backbone to all things BI, establish and maintain high data integrity, quality, and governance standards. Craft data management practices are in place to support accurate and reliable data analysis.     Develop dashboards that provide up to date information to sales leaders and sales associates on KPIs and other business objectives and goals.     Translate intricate datasets into intuitive and insightful visualizations that drive data-based decision-making across the organization.     Identify and communicate new requirements to enhance CRM capabilities to support reporting and analytics.     Collaborate with IT in the selection, implementation, and management of BI tools and technologies.      Distill insights from data and communicate recommendations to business customers.     Oversee the selection, implementation, and management of BI tools and technologies. Lead the creation and maintenance of reports, dashboards, and other data visualizations.     Translate raw data into visual contexts that is easy for business customers to interpret.     Oversee BI projects/enhancements from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time and within budget.     Present data insights to stakeholders and business leaders clearly and in a relatable way.     Influence key decisions that would affect business decisions.     Maintain an accurate data portfolio that includes high quality dashboards and data models.     Mentor and upskill team members including data analysts, system admin and BI Developers.     Participate in the exploration and evaluation of emerging reporting tools, technologies, and methodologies to drive innovation and leverage best practices to advance the organizations BI capabilities.         Requirements        Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field. A masters degree or an MBA can be advantageous.     7-10 years of experience within Data Management or Visualization.     7-10 years of experience in a high-functioning, fast-pace work environment with strong business acumen.     3-5 years of people leaders with high social intelligence.     Manage and mentor junior data analysts and BI developers.     Proven expertise in executing data management, reporting & visualization in Domo. Secondarily Power BI and Tableau.     Experience with Amazon Redshift and DBT desired.      Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite.     Knowledge of complex data integration from multiple data sources.     Experience with Statistics and probability.     Excellent verbal and written communication skills to translate complex data into easy-to-understand, practical terms that every person can understand.     Deep understanding of data governance, compliance and privacy best practices.     Agility to changing priorities and situations.     High attention to detail and accuracy.
